title: Happy Birthday, Yoshiko-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>Heh, today is the day of my birth. Give praise, little demons!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Yoshiko-san, happy birthday. We’re celebrating today, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Indeed. Since it’s a birthday celebration, surely you’ve prepared an offering for this Yohane, haven’t you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I’m so glad you asked! I couldn’t wait any longer to give it to you, Yoshiko-san!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Wha-, what enthusiasm.... But, would it really satisfy me, I wonder.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Fufufu, then Yohane-sama, try opening this.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Alright.... Hmm? T-, this is....!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>That’s right! I knew you would recognize it, Yoshiko-san!! This bracelet is from the thing we saw together the other day--<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>The one the main character of that light novel movie adaptation wore!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Uwaaaaaaah, the main character that wore this was so cool, so I really wanted it! Thank you, Setsuna~~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
